thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 10
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: From airport transfer to hotel, the tour and airport transfer to airport this was a tour i could not fault. Tour Leader excellent (Nicky Beneda), accommodation above expectation, tours, inclusions, food and opportunities to meet locals - we could not have asked for more. Even our train trip from Bikaner to Jaisalmer on hard seats for 5 to 6 hours was a treat given we shared with many festival goers who sang and played music for 2/3 of our journey when they got off. Don't miss the camel trip - while it was on the edge of the dunes it was an experience I would recommend to all
